sexual_health.en: Sexual health is about physical, mental, emotional, and social well-being in relation to sexuality.
sexual_health.sw: Afya ya ngono inahusu ustawi wa kimwili, kiakili, kihisia na kijamii kuhusiana na masuala ya ngono.

safe_sex.en: Safe sex involves using protection and getting regular check-ups to prevent STIs.
safe_sex.sw: Ngono salama inahusisha kutumia kinga na kupata uchunguzi wa mara kwa mara kuzuia magonjwa ya ngono.
